issues.description: The template declares and exports the function symbol fix_vec_sub_asm (global directive), but the solution incorrectly marks it as extern, causing a mismatch in symbol linkage and visibility across the artifacts. This prevents the solution’s definition from being exported and will confuse students when linking.
issues.suggested_fix: In the solution repository’s fix_vec_sub.asm, replace the ‘extern fix_vec_sub_asm’ directive with ‘global fix_vec_sub_asm’ to match the template and ensure the function is correctly exported.
